attributes.action: allow 'Diddy' David Hamilton to be the Compère at the 2012 London Olympic stadium
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having heard Davids voice at Fulham every game for the past 6 years, I think that his voice is one that everyone would love an enjoy

rejection.details: Please contact the Olympic organising committee with your request.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
